verses.verse: <WG2532> The fifth<WG3991> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> a star<WG792> from<WG1537> the sky<WG3772> which had fallen<WG4098> to<WG1519> the earth.<WG1093> <WG2532> The key<WG2807> to the pit<WG5421> of the abyss<WG12> was given<WG1325> to him.<WG846>

<WG2532> He opened<WG455> the pit<WG5421> of the abyss,<WG12> and<WG2532> smoke<WG2586> went up<WG305> out<WG1537> of the pit,<WG5421> like<WG5613> the smoke<WG2586> from a burning<WG3173> furnace.<WG2575> <WG2532> The sun<WG2246> and<WG2532> the air<WG109> were darkened<WG4654> because<WG1537> of the smoke<WG2586> from the pit.<WG5421>

Then<WG2532> out<WG1537> of the smoke<WG2586> came<WG1831> forth locusts<WG200> on<WG1519> the earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> power<WG1849> was given<WG1325> to them,<WG846> as<WG5613> the scorpions<WG4651> of the earth<WG1093> have<WG2192> power.<WG1849>

<WG2532> They<WG846> were told<WG4483> that<WG2443> they should<WG91> not<WG3361> hurt<WG91> the grass<WG5528> of the earth,<WG1093> neither<WG3761> any<WG3956> green thing,<WG5515> neither<WG3761> any<WG3956> tree,<WG1186> but<WG1487> only<WG3441> those<WG3748> people<WG444> who don't<WG3756> have<WG2192> God<WG2316>'s seal<WG4973> on<WG1909> their<WG846> foreheads.<WG3361>

<WG2532> They<WG846> were given<WG1325> power<WG615> not<WG3361> to kill<WG615> them,<WG846> but<WG235> to<WG2443> torment<WG928> them<WG846> for five<WG4002> months.<WG3376> <WG2532> Their<WG846> torment<WG929> was like<WG5613> the torment<WG929> of a scorpion,<WG4651> when<WG3752> it strikes<WG3817> a person.<WG444>

<WG2532> In<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250> people<WG444> will<WG2212> seek<WG2212> death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> will<WG2147> in no<WG3756> way find<WG2147> it.<WG846> <WG2532> They will desire<WG1937> to die,<WG599> and<WG2532> death<WG2288> will flee<WG5343> from<WG575> them.<WG846>

<WG2532> The shapes<WG3667> of the locusts<WG200> were like<WG3664> horses<WG2462> prepared<WG2090> for<WG1519> war.<WG4171> <WG2532> On<WG1909> their<WG846> heads<WG2776> were<WG5613> something like<WG3664> golden<WG5557> crowns,<WG4735> and<WG2532> their<WG846> faces<WG4383> were like<WG5613> people<WG444>'s faces.<WG4383>
<WG2532> They had<WG2192> hair<WG2359> like<WG5613> women<WG1135>'s hair,<WG2359> and<WG2532> their<WG846> teeth<WG3599> were<WG2258> like<WG5613> those of lions.<WG3023>

<WG2532> They had<WG2192> breastplates,<WG2382> like<WG5613> breastplates<WG2382> of iron.<WG4603> <WG2532> The sound<WG5456> of their<WG846> wings<WG4420> was like<WG5613> the sound<WG5456> of chariots,<WG716> or of many<WG4183> horses<WG2462> rushing<WG5143> to<WG1519> war.<WG4171>

<WG2532> They have<WG2192> tails<WG3769> like<WG3664> those of scorpions,<WG4651> and<WG2532> <WG2258> stings.<WG2759> <WG2532> In<WG1722> their<WG846> tails<WG3769> they<WG846> have power<WG1849> to harm<WG91> men<WG444> for five<WG4002> months.<WG3376>

<WG2532> They have<WG2192> over<WG1909> them<WG846> as king<WG935> the angel<WG32> of the abyss.<WG12> His name<WG3686> in Hebrew<WG1447> is<WG3> "Abaddon," but<WG2532> in<WG1722> Greek,<WG1673> he<WG846> has<WG2192> the name<WG3686> "Apollyon.<WG623>"
The first<WG1520> woe<WG3759> is past.<WG565> Behold,<WG2400> there are still<WG2089> two<WG1417> woes<WG3759> coming<WG2064> after this.<WG5023>

<WG2532> The sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> sounded.<WG4537> <WG2532> I heard<WG191> a<WG3391> voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> the<WG5064> horns<WG2768> of the golden<WG5552> altar<WG2379> which<WG3588> is before<WG1799> God,<WG2316>

saying<WG3004> to the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> who<WG3739> had<WG2192> one trumpet,<WG4536> "Free<WG3089> the four<WG5064> angels<WG32> who<WG3588> are bound<WG1210> at<WG1909> the great<WG3173> river<WG4215> Euphrates!<WG2166>"

<WG2532> The four<WG5064> angels<WG32> were freed<WG3089> who<WG3588> had been prepared<WG2090> for<WG1519> that hour<WG5610> and<WG2532> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> month<WG3376> and<WG2532> year,<WG1763> so that<WG2443> they might kill<WG615> one third<WG5154> of mankind.<WG444>
<WG2532> The number<WG706> of the armies<WG4753> of the horsemen<WG2461> was two<WG1417> hundred million.<WG3461> <WG3461> <WG2532> I heard<WG191> the number<WG706> of them.<WG846>

<WG2532> Thus<WG3779> I saw<WG1492> the horses<WG2462> in<WG1722> the vision,<WG3706> and<WG2532> those<WG3588> who sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> them,<WG846> having<WG2192> breastplates<WG2382> of fiery<WG4447> red,<WG2532> hyacinth<WG5191> blue,<WG2532> and sulfur<WG2306> yellow;<WG2532> and the<WG2776> <WG2462> <WG5613> heads<WG2776> of lions.<WG3023> <WG2532> Out<WG1537> of their<WG846> mouths<WG4750> proceed<WG1607> fire,<WG4442> <WG2532> smoke,<WG2586> and<WG2532> sulfur.<WG2303>

By<WG5259> these<WG5130> three<WG5140> plagues were one third<WG5154> of mankind<WG444> killed:<WG615> by<WG1537> the fire,<WG4442> <WG2532> <WG1537> the smoke,<WG2586> and<WG2532> the<WG1537> sulfur,<WG2303> which<WG3588> proceeded<WG1607> out<WG1537> of their<WG846> mouths.<WG4750>

For<WG1063> the power<WG1849> of the horses is<WG2076> in<WG1722> their<WG846> mouths,<WG4750> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> their<WG846> tails.<WG3769> For<WG1063> their<WG846> tails<WG3769> are like<WG3664> serpents,<WG3789> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> heads,<WG2776> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> them<WG846> they harm.<WG91>

<WG2532> The rest<WG3062> of mankind,<WG444> who<WG3739> were<WG615> not<WG3756> killed<WG615> with<WG1722> these<WG3778> plagues,<WG4127> didn't<WG3756> repent<WG3340> of<WG1537> the works<WG2041> of their<WG846> hands,<WG5495> that<WG2443> they<WG4352> wouldn't<WG3361> worship<WG4352> demons,<WG1140> and<WG2532> the idols<WG1497> of gold,<WG5552> and<WG2532> of silver,<WG693> and<WG2532> of brass,<WG5470> and<WG2532> of stone,<WG3035> and<WG2532> of wood;<WG3585> which<WG3739> can<WG1410> neither<WG3777> see,<WG991> nor<WG3777> hear,<WG191> nor<WG3777> walk.<WG4043>

They<WG3340> didn't<WG3756> repent of<WG1537> their<WG846> murders,<WG5408> nor<WG3777> of<WG1537> their<WG846> sorceries,<WG2532> nor<WG3777> of<WG1537> their<WG846> sexual immorality,<WG4202> nor<WG3777> of<WG1537> their<WG846> thefts.<WG2809>
